page.title: 17EMPLOYMENT IN BUTTERLEIGH
page.content: Most people in the Butterleigh area work on land (e.g.Farming) but some work in the actual village itself. 2 work in the Blacksmith's shop;1 in the Post Office and 2 in the Public House. Because of the small size of the village,many of the others work elsewhere and most of them work in Exeter.There is a Bank Clerk;A School Ancillary Worker;A Headmaster;A Clinical Psychologist;an Accountant;A Shop Assistant and a Railway Worker. There are quite a few retired people in the area and a suprisingly large number of children.
